name: Chick-a-Bomb
description:
This is my contest entry for clickteam's #IWantToCreate contest. I only discovered it today so this was made in less than 20 hours including all 3D assets and fl studio music.

A chicken has to throw off some bombs that are dropped by the farmer's neighbor because he wants the farmer's property. The farmer denies because he likes his chicken farm, and so, the neighbor plans to destroy everything so he can buy the land after the farmer has nothing left. Can our chicken prevent disaster as much as he can?
